price: 35. Si ay wax uga cunaan midhahiisa, mana ayan sameyn gacmahoodu5. Ee Ma waysan (Alle u) mahad naqeyn?
arabic: لِيَأۡكُلُواْ مِن ثَمَرِهِۦ وَمَا عَمِلَتۡهُ أَيۡدِيهِمۡۚ أَفَلَا يَشۡكُرُونَ
footnotes: 5. Macno kale: Waa inay wax ka cunaan waxa ay gacmahoodu faleen (beereen oo soo goosteen). Labada macnoba waa sax.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: liyakulū min thamarihi wamā ʿamilathu aydīhim afalā yashkurūna
